name: Unfair Hangman
description:
It's like hangman, but less fair!

When playing in unfairly hard difficulty, it will only reveal letters when there's literally no words that don't match the letters you've guessed. Unfairly easy #1 is the exact opposite of unfairly hard, where it'll reveal as many letters as possible. Unfairly easy #2 tries to reveal at least one letter if it can and keep the available word count as high as possible. Regular difficulty is just a, well, regular game of hangman.

All assets were made by me except the pumpkin icon and the forest background which came from wpclipart.com .
